name: Amazon Web Services
description: Amazon Web Services has been the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud. AWS has been continually expanding its services to support virtually any workload, and it now has more than 240 fully featured services for compute, storage, databases, networking, analytics, machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI), Internet of Things (IoT), mobile, security, hybrid, media, and application development, deployment, and management. To learn more about AWS, visit aws.amazon.com.

name: CoreWeave
description: CoreWeave is The Essential Cloud for AI™. Built for pioneers by pioneers, CoreWeave delivers a platform of technology, tools, and teams that enables innovators to move at the pace of innovation, building and scaling AI with confidence. Trusted by leading AI labs, startups, and global enterprises, CoreWeave serves as a force multiplier by combining superior infrastructure performance with deep technical expertise to accelerate breakthroughs.

name: Dell Technologies
description: Dell Technologies (NYSE: DELL) helps organizations and individuals build their digital future and transform how they work, live and play. The company provides customers with the industry’s broadest and most innovative technology and services portfolio for the AI era.

name: Google Cloud
description: Google Cloud is the new way to the cloud, providing AI, infrastructure, developer, data, security, and collaboration tools built for today and tomorrow. Google Cloud offers a powerful, optimized AI stack with its own planet-scale infrastructure, custom-built chips, generative AI models and development platform, as well as AI-powered applications, to help organizations transform. Customers in more than 200 countries and territories turn to Google Cloud as their trusted technology partner.

name: HPE
description: HPE is a leader in essential enterprise technology, bringing together the power of AI, cloud, and networking to help organizations achieve more. As pioneers of possibility, our innovation and expertise advance the way people live and work. We empower our customers across industries to optimize operational performance, transform data into foresight, and maximize their impact. Unlock your boldest ambitions, with HPE.

name: Microsoft Azure
description: Microsoft creates platforms and tools powered by AI to deliver innovative solutions that meet the evolving needs of our customers. The technology company is committed to making AI available broadly and doing so responsibly, with a mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more.

name: Nebius
description: Nebius is a leading AI Cloud built to service the explosive growth of the global AI industry. The company has a global footprint with R&D hubs across Europe, North America and Israel. The core offering is an AI-centric cloud platform, fully developed in-house — including software, servers, racks, and data center design. The platform provides ML engineers and AI developers with the compute, storage, MLOps services, and tools needed to build, tune, and deploy AI models efficiently and at scale.

name: Oracle
description: Oracle delivers computing infrastructure and software to drive innovation, efficiency, and effectiveness. We developed the world’s only autonomous database to organize and secure data. Oracle Cloud Infrastructure offers high performance, security, and cost savings, enabling easy workload migration to the cloud. Our cloud applications help leaders innovate, grow sustainably, and build resilience.

name: Aivres Systems
description: Aivres is a data center and AI infrastructure solutions provider committed to delivering innovative technologies that propel the world’s leading industries to new frontiers. We widely deliver and deploy cutting-edge hardware products and designs to major data centers supporting critical workloads in AI, cloud computing, and enterprise.

name: ASUS
description: Founded in 1989, ASUS is a global leader in computer hardware known for innovation and reliability. ASUS advances AI and server technologies with high-performance solutions for data centers and accelerated computing. Key milestones include the Taiwania 2 supercomputer (TOP500 #10, Green500 #20) and the energy-efficient Forerunner 1 data center with a PUE of 1.17.

name: Cisco
description: Cisco is revolutionizing how infrastructure and data connect and protect organizations in the AI era. We help organizations transform data centers to power AI initiatives, create future-proofed workplaces, and drive digital resilience. Only Cisco combines the power of the network with security, observability, and collaboration to help organizations thrive.

name: DDN
description: DDN is a leading AI and data intelligence company, empowering organizations to maximize the value of their data with end-to-end HPC and AI-focused solutions. Its customers range from the largest global enterprises and AI hyperscalers to cutting-edge research centers, all leveraging DDN’s proven data intelligence platform for scalable, secure, and high-performance AI deployments that drive 10x returns. Follow DDN: LinkedIn, X, and YouTube.

name: Delta Electronics
description: Delta Electronics is a global leader in power and energy solutions, Delta serves industries such as IT, communications, industrial automation, renewable energy, building automation, and EVs. With increasing AI and cloud computing demands, Delta pioneers advanced power and cooling solutions for AI-driven data centers. Through ongoing research and development, Delta remains committed to improving energy efficiency and delivering sustainable, intelligent solutions for a greener future.

name: Ernst & Young
description: We help leaders turn AI ambition into action — building trusted foundations, unlocking new value and help empowering people to lead responsibly. EY.ai provides the strategy, tools and confidence to scale transformation across the enterprise.

name: Foxconn
description: Hon Hai Technology Group (Foxconn) is the world’s largest electronics manufacturer and leading technological solutions provider. It is 28th in Fortune Global 500, one of the world's largest employers and operates over 230 campuses in 24 countries. Industries of EVs, digital health, and robotics plus AI, semiconductors and next-generation communications technologies plus platforms of Smart Manufacturing, Smart EV, Smart City, make up the “3+3+3” strategy driving the Group’s long-term growth.

name: GIGABYTE
description: Giga Computing, a subsidiary of GIGABYTE, designs, manufactures, and sells GIGABYTE server products, leveraging expertise in Gen AI server hardware and advanced cooling technologies. Operating independently, it invests strategically to deliver a broad portfolio spanning data centers to edge environments, addressing workloads in HPC, AI, data analytics, 5G, and cloud. In close collaboration with NVIDIA, it develops cutting-edge, secure, scalable, and sustainable solutions.

name: Lenovo
description: Focused on a bold vision to deliver Smarter Technology for All, Lenovo has built on its success as the world’s largest PC company with a pocket-to cloud portfolio of AI-enabled, AI-ready, and AI-optimized devices (PCs, workstations, smartphones, tablets), infrastructure (server, storage, edge, high performance computing and software defined infrastructure), software, solutions, and services.

name: Nscale
description: Nscale designs, builds, and operates sovereign, sustainable, and modular AI factories that deliver high-performance GPU clusters to accelerate AI cloud services globally. Nscale keeps every byte of data and every AI workload within national or regional borders, ensuring full compliance with local regulations and security mandates. You gain a dedicated, private AI cloud on domestic soil, which is essential for government and enterprise.

name: PNY Technologies
description: PNY is a global technology leader committed to delivering high-quality consumer and business-grade solutions. With 40 years of expertise, PNY serves consumers, B2B clients, and OEMs worldwide. Our products are available in more than 50 countries, supported by 20 company locations across North America, Latin America, Europe, and Asia. Our solutions are offered through leading retailers, e-tailers, wholesalers, and distributors.

name: QCT
description: Quanta Cloud Technology (QCT) designs, manufactures, integrates, and services cutting-edge offerings for 5G Telco/Edge, AI/HPC, Cloud, and Enterprise infrastructure via its global network. Product lines include hyper-converged and software-defined data center solutions as well as servers, storage, and network switches from 1U to entire racks with a diverse ecosystem of hardware components and software partners to fit a variety of business verticals and workload parameters.

name: Schneider Electric
description: We are a global energy technology partner bringing world-leading expertise in electrification, automation and digitization to smart industries, resilient infrastructure, future-proof AI factories, intelligent buildings, and intuitive homes.

name: Supermicro
description: Supermicro® (NASDAQ: SMCI), with 30+ years of leadership in AI, Enterprise, cloud, and 5G Telco/Edge Infrastructure solutions, pioneers the industry with Building Block Solutions® and Green Computing servers. Its customizable, efficient, and sustainable IT offerings such as liquid-cooling technology redefine performance standards and environmental responsibility.

name: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS)
description: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), part of the Tata Group, is a global leader in IT services and digital transformation. Since 1968, TCS has delivered innovation and excellence, serving clients across 55 countries with 202 delivery centers. Recognized as a top employer worldwide, TCS drives adaptive enterprises through cutting-edge technologies. It sponsors major marathons globally and reported revenues of $30B in FY 2025. Learn more at www.tcs.com.

name: Together AI
description: Together AI is the AI Native Cloud built with a full suite of tooling across model training, fine-tuning, and inference. AI-native builders can reliably scale their apps to meet demand, while gaining from industry-leading price performance and breakthrough research from our leading AI systems researchers. Trusted by leading AI natives like ElevenLabs, Cursor, Decagon, AI21, Hedra, and Cartesia, and SaaS innovators like Salesforce, Zoom, and Zomato, Together AI powers AI-native applications.

name: Vertiv
description: Vertiv (NYSE: VRT) combines hardware, software, analytics and ongoing services to enable its customers’ vital applications to run continuously, perform optimally and grow with their needs. Vertiv solves important challenges facing data centers, communication networks and commercial and industrial facilities with a portfolio of power, cooling and IT infrastructure solutions and services from the cloud to the edge of the network. HQ: Westerville, Ohio, USA, Vertiv does business in 130+ countries.

name: Wistron & Wiwynn
description: Wistron, a global leader in technology and communication solutions, drives innovation across industries with advanced design and manufacturing expertise. Its subsidiary, Wiwynn, specializes in cloud IT infrastructure and AI-driven solutions, empowering hyperscale data centers worldwide. Together, we deliver cutting-edge technologies that accelerate digital transformation and sustainable growth.

name: World Wide Technology
description: World Wide Technology (WWT), a technology solutions provider leading the AI and Digital Revolution, offers a proven approach for organizations to evaluate, architect and implement multi-vendor solutions. Through the Advanced Technology Center, clients have hands-on access to capabilities across infrastructure, AI, security, cloud and more. Learn more at wwt.com.

name: Accenture
description: Accenture is a leading solutions and global professional services company that helps the world’s leading enterprises reinvent by building their digital core and unleashing the power of AI to create value at speed across the enterprise, bringing together the talent of our approximately 779,000 people, our proprietary assets and platforms, and deep ecosystem relationships.

name: AHEAD
description: AHEAD creates integrated AI platforms and resilient digital backbones on NVIDIA technologies that help leading organizations move from experimentation to AI at scale. As an NVIDIA Elite Partner, our consultative approach, engineering depth, and innovative solutions unlock the full value of accelerated computing in every client we serve.

name: Akamai Technologies
description: Akamai is the cybersecurity and cloud computing company that powers and protects business online. We provide the critical infrastructure enterprises need to build, secure, and scale next-generation AI applications — without the cost and constraints of centralized clouds. Our distributed architecture and edge network deliver GPU-powered compute and adaptive security closer to users and data than any other cloud platform, enabling real-time inference and agentic AI at global scale.

name: CoolIT Systems
description: CoolIT Systems specializes in scalable liquid cooling solutions for the world’s most demanding computing environments. A 25-year pioneer in liquid cooling for microprocessors, CoolIT’s technology cools over 5 million GPUs and CPUs globally. CoolIT partners with global processor and server design leaders to develop the most efficient and reliable liquid cooling solutions. CoolIT also provides system design, installation and maintenance services in over 80 countries worldwide.

name: CrowdStrike
description: CrowdStrike has one of the world’s most advanced cloud-native platforms, protecting critical areas of enterprise risk – endpoints and cloud workloads, identity and data.  Purpose-built in the cloud with a single lightweight-agent architecture.

name: Crusoe Energy
description: As the AI factory company, Crusoe is on a mission to accelerate the abundance of energy and intelligence. Crusoe provides a reliable, scalable, cost-effective, and environmentally friendly solution for AI infrastructure by harnessing large-scale clean energy, building AI-optimized data centers, and empowering builders to reach their AI potential. Crusoe empowers its customers to build the future faster.

name: Deloitte
description: Deloitte is at the forefront of the pioneering efforts to transform data processing, analytics, and AI. Using GPU-enabled technology, we generate meaningful insights, co-innovate with our clients, and develop solutions to core business challenges. Together, Deloitte and NVIDIA help organizations seize opportunities through an accelerated AI platform, combining computing power and deep learning models to deliver new capabilities, value, and a competitive advantage.

name: Firmus
description: Firmus is a global leader addressing AI’s energy challenge. Founded in Australia in 2019, Firmus developed the AI Factory — a new class of purpose-built infrastructure designed to deliver green AI tokens as efficiently as possible. Using advanced liquid cooling, energy-smart systems and modular design, Firmus lowers the cost and impact of AI at scale. In 2025, Firmus launched Project Southgate, Australia’s AI Factory roadmap, anchored by a flagship green AI Factory Campus in Tasmania.

name: HP
description: HP Z Workstations & Solutions portfolio includes high- performance laptops, desktops, and solutions designed to accelerate advanced AI workflows and power breakthrough innovation.

name: IBM
description: IBM is a leading global hybrid cloud and AI, and business services provider, helping clients in more than 175 countries capitalize on insights from their data, streamline business processes, reduce costs and gain the competitive edge in their industries. All of this is backed by IBM’s legendary commitment to trust, transparency, responsibility, inclusivity, and service. For more information, visit www.ibm.com

name: IREN
description: IREN is a leading owner and operator of institutional-grade, highly efficient next-generation data centers powered by 100% renewable energy. Our data centers are optimized for power-dense computing applications including generative AI, Bitcoin mining and beyond.

name: Lambda
description: Lambda, The Superintelligence Cloud, builds Gigawatt-scale AI Factories for Training and Inference. Lambda’s mission is to make compute as ubiquitous as electricity and give every person access to artificial intelligence. One person, one GPU.

name: Micron Technology
description: Micron is a leader in memory and storage solutions, transforming how the world uses information to enrich life for all. Our high-performance DRAM, NAND and NOR products fuel the data economy, enabling advances in AI and compute-intensive applications from the data center to the intelligent edge, and across client and mobile segments.

name: Mistral AI
description: Mistral AI is a pioneer company in generative artificial intelligence, empowering the world with the tools to build and benefit from the most transformative technology of our time. The company democratizes AI through high-performance, optimized, and cutting-edge open-source models, products and solutions as well as end-to-end infrastructure with Mistral Compute.

name: NetApp
description: NetApp is the intelligent data infrastructure company, combining unified data storage, integrated data services, and CloudOps solutions to turn a world of disruption into opportunity for every customer.

name: Radiant
description: Radiant is a vertically integrated AI infrastructure company combining utility-scale powered land, long-term capital, and a proprietary AI infrastructure software platform. Radiant builds and operates AI factories for enterprises, telecommunications providers, and sovereign institutions, delivering scalable compute with utility-grade economics, operational resilience, and planning horizons aligned to the long-term demands of the AI economy.

name: Samsung Semiconductor
description: Samsung Semiconductor is a global technology leader in advanced memory, logic, and foundry solutions for next-generation computing. Our solutions power AI, intelligent edge, and embedded platforms with high performance and energy efficiency. Through close customer collaboration with over 30 years of memory leadership, we optimize system architectures, accelerate time to market, and drive innovation across applications, transforming how data is stored, moved, and processed in the AI era.

name: SAP
description: As a global leader in enterprise applications and business AI, SAP  stands at the nexus of business and technology. For over 50 years, organizations have trusted SAP  to bring out their best by uniting business-critical operations spanning finance, procurement, HR, supply chain, and customer experience.

name: ServiceNow
description: ServiceNow (NYSE: NOW) makes the world work better for everyone. Our cloud‑based platform and solutions help digitize and unify organizations so that they can find smarter, faster, better ways to make work flow. So employees and customers can be more connected, more innovative, and more agile. And we can all create the future we imagine. The world works with ServiceNow.

name: SK hynix
description:
SK hynix is the AI memory specialist — a full-stack creator building sustainable future tech with global partners. We co-engineer memory architectures to unlock peak performance, efficiency, and scalability for next-gen AI. Experience our innovations firsthand at our booth — where AI memory comes alive through real demos and interactive showcases. Together, we’re not just advancing tech — we’re shaping how AI powers the world, responsibly & sustainably. 
-Full Stack AI Memory Creator, SK hynix!

name: VAST Data
description: VAST Data is the AI Operating System company, delivering a unified software stack built to unlock AI’s full potential. The VAST AI OS combines data, compute, and agentic execution in one scalable platform, enabling real-time reasoning, AI agent collaboration, and automated workflows at global scale. Powered by VAST’s breakthrough DASE architecture, it removes tradeoffs across performance, scale, simplicity and resilience. VAST transformed its infrastructure into a global fabric for reasoning AI.

name: Vultr
description: Vultr is the world’s largest privately held cloud infrastructure company, serving more than 1.5 million customers across 185 countries and 32 cloud data center regions. As an AI-first global cloud platform, Vultr supports enterprises across financial services, telecom, healthcare, retail, manufacturing, media, and more. Its cloud, GPU, bare metal, Kubernetes, storage, and networking services deliver high performance, transparent pricing, and geographic reach for cloud- and AI-native workloads.

name: Advantech
description: As an NVIDIA elite partner, Advantech has developed a comprehensive portfolio of industrial AI platforms embedded with the latest NVIDIA technologies. From smart AI cameras and rugged edge systems to high-performance GPU servers, our versatile solutions accelerate AI deployment across robotics, manufacturing, agriculture, healthcare, and more.

name: Agile Robots SE
description: Agile Robots is a leading provider of next-generation automation solutions. By combining artificial intelligence and robotics, the company makes industries smarter, more flexible, and more efficient. Founded in Munich in 2018 by renowned robotics researchers from the German Aerospace Center (DLR), Agile Robots has experienced rapid global growth. Today, more than 2,500 highly skilled robotics and AI enthusiasts are employed in Germany, China, India and the United States.

name: Baseten
description: Baseten’s AI inference platform offers industry-leading performance, security, and scale for organizations building AI products. With features like on-chip model optimization, autoscaling, and a developer-friendly interface, Baseten enables rapid, secure, and cost-effective deployment, ensuring businesses can maintain competitive user experiences while adhering to strict compliance requirements.

name: Cadence
description: Cadence is a market leader in AI and digital twins, pioneering the application of computational software to accelerate innovation in silicon, systems, and drug design. Our design solutions, based on Cadence’s Intelligent System Design™ strategy, are the software, hardware and IP that turn design concepts into reality.

name: Capital One
description: At Capital One, we use real-time data at scale, AI and machine learning, and the power of the cloud to solve challenging industry problems and build products, services, and experiences that can make a real difference in millions of peoples’ lives.

name: CDW
description: CDW is a leading multi-brand technology solutions provider to business, government, education & healthcare customers in the US, UK & Canada with over 30 years experience offering industry-leading technology solutions, services, products & updates.

name: Cloudflare
description: Cloudflare, Inc. (NYSE: NET) is the leading connectivity cloud company. It empowers organizations to make their employees, applications, and networks faster and more secure everywhere, while reducing complexity and cost. Powered by one of the world’s largest and most interconnected networks, Cloudflare blocks billions of threats online for its customers every day.

name: Databricks, Inc
description: Databricks is the Data and AI company. More than 20,000 organizations worldwide — including adidas, AT&T, Bayer, Block, Mastercard, Rivian, Unilever, and over 60% of the Fortune 500 — rely on Databricks to build and scale data and AI apps, analytics and agents. Headquartered in San Francisco with 30+ offices around the globe, Databricks offers a unified Data Intelligence Platform that includes Agent Bricks, Lakeflow, Lakehouse, Lakebase and Unity Catalog.

name: Eaton
description: Eaton is a global power management leader helping data centers operate reliably, efficiently, and sustainably. With solutions spanning UPS, PDUs, switchgear, busway, and intelligent monitoring, among others; Eaton optimizes white and gray space to support AI, cloud, and HPC workloads. Its expertise ensures uptime, scalability, and energy efficiency, enabling data centers to meet performance, cost, and sustainability goals.

name: Equinix, Inc.
description: Equinix, Inc. (Nasdaq: EQIX) shortens the path to boundless connectivity anywhere in the world. Its digital infrastructure, data center footprint and interconnected ecosystems empower innovations that enhance our work, life and planet. Equinix connects economies, countries, organizations and communities, delivering seamless digital experiences and cutting-edge AI—quickly, efficiently and everywhere.

name: Fireworks AI
description: Fireworks AI is a compound AI platform that helps enterprises build and deploy AI products at scale. It combines multiple models, modalities, and external tools to solve complex problems, while enhancing speed, reliability, and reducing costs.

name: Global AI
description: Global AI is a U.S.-based sovereign AI infrastructure company that designs, builds, and operates cutting-edge, high-performance AI infrastructure. As the world’s first sovereign AI hyperscaler, it delivers dedicated, single-tenant, air-gapped solutions to nations and enterprises. Global AI defines sovereign AI as the ability to build, operate, and secure AI within one’s own jurisdiction, free from external control and powered by trusted technology.

name: HCLTech
description: HCLTech is a global technology company, home to more than 226,600 people across 60 countries, delivering industry-leading capabilities centered around AI, digital, engineering, cloud and software, powered by a broad portfolio of technology services and products. To learn how we can supercharge progress for you, visit hcltech.com.

name: Hitachi
description: Through its Social Innovation Business (SIB), Hitachi brings together IT, OT (Operational Technology), and products to contribute to a harmonized society where environment, wellbeing, and economic growth are in balance. Hitachi operates globally in four sectors – Digital Systems & Services, Energy, Mobility, and Connective Industries – and the Strategic SIB Business Unit for new growth businesses. Hitachi integrates data, technology, and domain knowledge to solve customer and social challenges.

name: Hyve Solutions
description: Hyve Solutions Corporation is a leader in the design to worldwide deployment of hyperscale digital infrastructures. In partnership with customers, Hyve leverages deep-seated industry experience and strong vendor partnerships to design and deliver purpose-built server, storage, and networking solutions to meet datacenter demands for today and beyond. Hyve Solutions is a wholly owned subsidiary of TD SYNNEX Corporation (NYSE: SNX).

name: Infosys
description: Infosys is a global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting. Over 323,000 of our people work to amplify human potential and create the next opportunity for people, businesses and communities. We enable clients in 59 countries to navigate their digital transformation. With over four decades of experience in managing the systems and workings of global enterprises, we expertly steer clients, as they navigate their digital transformation powered by cloud and AI.

name: Inventec Corporation
description:
At Inventec, possibilities take shape.
Since 1975, we have offered scalable manufacturing capabilities to help technology brands and innovators scale new concepts worldwide.
Through our expertise and worldwide manufacturing presence, we reliably help customers capture market opportunities and make any vision sustainable and durable, regardless of scale or ambition.
At Inventec, we are inventing today and inspiring tomorrow.

name: Lightning AI
description: Lightning AI, the company behind PyTorch Lightning, provides an end-to-end platform for building, training, and deploying AI systems. Through it’s merger with Voltage Park, a neocloud and AI Factory, Lightning AI delivers  cost-efficient access to large-scale compute alongside tools for experimentation, training, and production - with security, observability, and control built in.

name: Lightwheel
description: Lightwheel is a global leader in synthetic data and Embodied AI Solutions. By combining generative AI with simulation, Lightwheel creates physically accurate and highly generalizable datasets that accelerate the deployment of embodied AI and world models. Lightwheel offers a suite of products including SimReady Assets & Scenes, the Data Pyramid, and the Enterprise Evaluation Platform, delivering end-to-end Embodied AI solutions.

name: LITEON Technology
description: LITEON, founded in 1975 as Taiwan’s first listed electronics company and LED pioneer, leads globally in power management and optoelectronics. With decades of expertise, LITEON delivers high-efficiency solutions for AI data centers and green infrastructure. Its portfolio spans AI infrastructure, optoelectronics, auto electronics, 5G & AIoT. For 20+ years, LITEON has advanced sustainability, partnering worldwide to create future-ready products and drive social responsibility through action.

name: Meta
description: Meet PyTorch core maintainers and experts from Meta, the PyTorch Foundation, and partners. Discover the latest advances in high-performance AI including custom kernels, Helion compiler, training, Reality Labs, and more. Come visit our booth to meet with experts who can discuss your AI challenges and advancements.

name: MSI
description: MSI is a leading global company in the ICT industry with more than 35 years of experience in gaming, content creation, business productivity, and AIoT solutions. Our strong R&D and manufacturing capabilities help to provide efficient DMS solutions for various AIoT applications, including cloud servers, network appliances, AI robotic appliances, vehicle infotainment, industrial automation, and more. We are known as a trusted partner who helps businesses extract value from industrial data.

name: Nokia
description: Nokia is a global leader in connectivity for the AI era. With expertise across fixed, mobile, and transport networks, we’re advancing connectivity to secure a brighter world.

name: PEGATRON
description: PEGATRON leverages extensive product development and vertically integrated manufacturing to deliver innovative design and end-to-end production services that efficiently meet customer needs. Building on deep experience in server design, manufacturing, and deployment, PEGATRON develops advanced liquid-cooled and air-cooled x86/ARM servers, racks, and AI clusters for current and future CSP and enterprise data centers.

name: Penguin Solutions
description: The most exciting technological advancements are also the most challenging. As a NVIDIA Elite Partner & DGX-Ready Managed Services Provider, Penguin provides expert end-to-end support across the full AI lifecycle. Our OriginAI® pre-validated architectures, ICE ClusterWare™ software, and expert services accelerate deployments and optimize performance. We design, build, deploy, and manage HPC enterprise solutions, allowing customers to focus on AI applications and achieve breakthrough innovations.

name: Pure Storage
description: Pure Storage delivers the world's most powerful data storage platform for HPC and AI. The Pure Storage platform allows organizations ultimate simplicity and flexibility, saving time, money, and energy to store, manage, and protect the world’s data at any scale. From AI to archive, Pure Storage delivers a cloud experience with one unified Storage-as-a-Service platform across on premises, cloud, and hosted environments—with zero planned downtime, guaranteed. Take the next step in your AI journey.

name: SHI International Corp.
description: Over 17,000 organizations worldwide rely on SHI’s concierge approach to help them solve what’s next with scalable and cost-effective infrastructure, end-user computing, and cybersecurity solutions.

name: Simplismart
description: Simplismart is a cloud-agnostic and model-agnostic MLOps platform designed to help you train, monitor, and deploy GenAI workflows with unmatched performance, scalability, and efficiency. With the fastest inference deployments in the industry, it streamlines workflows and offers end-to-end control, enabling enterprise-grade solutions in just a few clicks.

name: SoftServe
description: SoftServe is a premier IT consulting and digital services provider and NVIDIA’s 2025 Service Delivery Partner of the Year. We help organizations solve complex business challenges through emerging technologies and measurable outcomes. Our expertise spans NVIDIA’s full stack, across Generative AI, Agentic AI, Physical AI, and Embedded Computing. Clients rely on SoftServe to architect and execute mature and innovative capabilities, such as digital engineering, data and analytics, cloud, and AI/ML.

name: Synopsys
description:
Synopsys is the leader in engineering solutions from silicon to systems, enabling 
customers to rapidly innovate AI-powered products. We deliver industry-leading 
silicon design, IP, simulation and analysis solutions, and design services. We 
partner closely with our customers across a wide range of industries to maximize 
their R&D capability and productivity, powering innovation today that ignites the 
ingenuity of tomorrow. Learn more at www.synopsys.com.

name: Weka
description: WEKA is transforming the AI Factory by removing bottlenecks across training and inference—from keeping GPUs fully hydrated with data to solving the toughest memory challenges. At its foundation is NeuralMesh, the only fully software-defined storage system built for AI at scale. With additional capabilities like NeuralMesh Axon (embedded on GPUs), Augmented Memory Grid (a petabyte-scale token warehouse), and WARRP (a RAG blueprint)—WEKA helps organizations build, run, and scale AI efficiently.

name: Yotta Data Services
description: Yotta Data Services is a sovereign cloud and AI cloud provider offering data center hosting, connectivity, cybersecurity, and managed IT services. Its MeitY-empanelled Yntraa cloud runs from hyperscale data centers in Panvel and Greater Noida. Yotta’s Shakti Cloud delivers advanced AI services with NVIDIA NIM and GPU-powered clusters. Yotta is the only APAC NVIDIA Cloud Partner in the Exemplar initiative and one of six global Reference Architecture NCPs.

name: ABB
description: ABB is a global technology leader in electrification and automation. We see our purpose as being to enable a more sustainable and resource-efficient future. By connecting our engineering and digitalization expertise, we help industries run at high performance, while becoming more efficient, productive and sustainable so they outperform. We call this: ‘Engineered to Outrun.’ We have around 110,000 employees worldwide and a history that stretches back more than 140 years.

name: Anaconda
description: Anaconda is the trusted platform that transforms data experimentation into production-ready intelligence. Build with pre-vetted open-source Python packages, including NVIDIA-accelerated GPU libraries, manage environments securely, and deploy AI models like NVIDIA Nemotron with governance. We bring development speed with enterprise grade control to AI workloads, delivering open innovation at scale.

name: Arrow
description: Since 1935, Arrow Electronics has developed technology solutions that improve business and daily life. As the leading hybrid cloud and AI aggregator, Arrow’s enterprise computing solutions business helps supercharge growth for IT providers and vendors. Our comprehensive capabilities include powerful digital platforms, technical expertise, a multitude of specialized IT services, and a robust global line card of innovative products and solutions.

name: ASROCK RACK INC.
description: ASRock Rack Inc., founded in 2013 in Taipei, Taiwan, is a leading server company renowned for its comprehensive portfolio of server products tailored for a diverse range of applications, from small businesses to large-scale workloads.

name: Astera Labs
description: Astera Labs delivers purpose-built connectivity for rack-scale AI infrastructure. Astera Labs’ Intelligent Connectivity Platform supports CXL®, Ethernet, NVLink, PCIe®, and UALink™ technologies with the COSMOS software suite to unify diverse components into cohesive, flexible systems that deliver end-to-end scale-up, and scale-out connectivity. From custom to standards-based solutions, Astera Labs enables customers to deploy architectures tailored to their unique AI infrastructure requirements.

name: Astris AI, A Lockheed Martin Company
description: Lockheed Martin, in its work with the U.S. Department of Defense (DoD), faced an immense challenge: meeting the strictest security, governance, and transparency requirements while delivering advanced AI capabilities. Lockheed Martin’s AI Center (LAIC) developed the AI Factory—a secure, scalable, and modular AI platform designed to deliver state-of-the-art AI solutions with full traceability, governance, and security.

name: Capgemini
description: Capgemini is an AI-powered global business and technology transformation partner, delivering tangible business value. We imagine the future of organizations and make it real with AI, technology, and people. With our strong heritage of nearly 60 years, we are a responsible and diverse group of 420,000 team members in more than 50 countries. We deliver end-to-end services and solutions with our deep industry expertise and strong partner ecosystem.

Powered by FleetIQ, it delivers sub-microsecond cross-stack observability, workload-aware fault tolerance, and acceleration to achieve up to 2× faster jobs and peak cluster utilization across Ethernet, RoCE, and InfiniBand. Companies including Uber, Wells Fargo, DCAI, WhiteFiber, Nebius, and Nscale rely on Clockwork for their most demanding workloads.

name: Cloudian
description: Cloudian's HyperScale® AI Data Platform is an integrated solution for AI workloads, built on Cloudian’s award-winning enterprise-grade, S3-compatible object storage. Featuring S3 RDMA, Cloudian enables TB/s bandwidth between storage and NVIDIA GPUs for accelerated training and inference. Deploy AI infrastructure on-premises with full data sovereignty, exabyte scalability, and seamless hybrid cloud integration. Built-in security, multitenancy, and robust management simplify AI operations at scale

name: Cohere Technologies
description: Cohere is the innovator of Universal Spectrum Multiplier (USM) software for 4G, 5G, and Multi-G. USM significantly improves mobile networks in any FDD and TDD spectrum band. Cohere is the innovator of Pulsone™ Technology which is based on the Zak-OTFS waveform for ISAC and NTN. Pulsone is a trademark of Cohere Technologies. The company is headquartered in San Jose, Calif. (USA). Website: www.cohere-tech.com

name: Cohesity
description: Cohesity protects, secures, and provides insights into the world’s data. As the leader in AI-powered data security, Cohesity helps organizations strengthen resilience, accelerate recovery, and reduce IT costs. With Zero Trust security and advanced AI/ML, Cohesity Data Cloud is trusted by customers in more than 140 countries, including 70% of the Global 500. Cohesity is also backed by industry leaders such as NVIDIA, Amazon, Google, IBM, Cisco, and HPE.

name: Connect Tech
description: Connect Tech is a global leader in Edge AI compute solutions, including edge devices, carrier boards, thermal solutions, etc. As an NVIDIA Jetson Elite Partner, Connect Tech’s diverse portfolio of products meets the demands of the most challenging Edge AI applications, including industrial automation, public sector, robotics, transportation, and more.

name: Contextual AI
description: Contextual AI provides the context layer that makes AI work for expert-level technical tasks. The platform turns hours of complex expert work—technical customer support, device log analysis, patent research, production planning—into minutes. Founded by the team that pioneered RAG at Meta, customers include Qualcomm, Advantest, ShipBob, and NVIDIA.

name: D3 Embedded
description: D3 Embedded is a U.S.-based company that develops end-to-end solutions integrating rugged camera and radar sensors, connectivity, custom Jetson boards, and AI to deliver advanced perception for performance-critical applications.

name: Dassault Systèmes
description: Dassault Systèmes promotes human progress in three sectors – Life Sciences/Healthcare, Infrastructure/Cities & Manufacturing Industries. We equip businesses and individuals with virtual universes to envision sustainable innovations that harmonize products, nature, and life.

name: DataRobot
description: DataRobot delivers AI that maximizes impact and minimizes business risk. Our AI applications and platform integrate into core business processes so teams can develop, deliver and govern AI at scale.

name: DeepHow
description: DeepHow is the AI-powered Operational Knowledge Management Platform for frontline work. It captures expert know-how, transforms it into intuitive guidance, delivers it in the flow of work, and uses AI to verify execution. Organizations use DeepHow to train faster, reduce errors, improve safety and quality, and ensure consistent execution across every site, role, and shift. From manufacturing to pharma, retail,  and consumer products, DeepHow turns tribal knowledge into a strategic advantage.

name: DeepRoute.ai
description: DeepRoute.ai is an AI company dedicated to the research, development and application of smart driving solutions. Being a pioneer in deploying end-to-end model, DeepRotue.ai aims to create AGI in robots through mass-produced vehicles.

name: Deepwave
description: Deepwave turns RF data into real-time insights.  Our team includes RF data, AI, and high-performance computing experts who saw the need for providing easier access to RF intelligence.  We launched the company to solve this challenge.  Deepwave provides intelligent RF data and infrastructure.  Our platform makes it easy to extract intelligence from RF signals to inform automated systems and workﬂows.  Deepwave holds US patents for the ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE RADIO TRANSCEIVER (“AIR-T”).

name: Delos Data
description: Delos Data is a startup building next-generation AI Interconnect, focused on optimizing for the GPU and AI workload. The company’s integrated approach across systems, software, and hardware addresses the critical bottlenecks of reliability and scale, unlocking higher utilization and efficiency for hyperscalers, AI enterprises, and next-generation datacenters.

name: DigitalOcean, LLC
description: DigitalOcean is the comprehensive agentic cloud, empowering developers at AI-native businesses and digital native enterprises to build full-stack AI applications with straightforward tools. Our agentic cloud provides users with intuitive building blocks that combine general purpose cloud services with advanced AI tooling. By removing traditional barriers like high cost and operational complexity, developers and businesses can build and scale with AI with ease.

name: Docker
description: Docker is the platform developers use to ship AI and cloud-native software, fast, reproducible, and secure. Create GPU-ready environments, accelerate builds with Docker Build Cloud, and orchestrate services with Docker Compose. Enable agentic AI workflows with MCP integrations, and protect your software supply chain with Docker Hardened Images (DHI) and policy controls from laptop to Kubernetes.

name: Domino Data Lab
description: Domino is the Enterprise AI platform trusted by leading organizations in Financial Services, Life Sciences, and Public Sector to accelerate AI from experimentation to production. We deliver proven solutions, or co-create new ones, achieving outcomes like 6× deployment velocity and 85% faster development while maintaining enterprise governance and security.

name: Dyna Robotics
description: Dyna Robotics builds embodied AI foundation models for real-world production. Its robots learn complex manipulation tasks like folding, packaging, kitting, and food prep, improving through thousands of policy training cycles monthly. After a $23.5M seed round, Dyna launched DYNA-1, now live commercially. Each deployment serves as both product and data engine, scaling robotic intelligence. Founded by Lindon Gao, York Yang, and former DeepMind scientist Jason Ma, Dyna closed a $120M Series A.

name: e-con Systems
description: With over 20 years of expertise in embedded vision, e-con Systems designs, develops, and manufactures OEM and ODM vision platforms . Its portfolio includes cameras, AI vision boxes, and other integrated imaging platforms for applications across robotics, mobility, medical and life sciences, intelligent transport systems (ITS), sports analytics, surveillance, smart agriculture and more. With 2 Million+ cameras shipped, e-con Systems powers over 350 customer products worldwide.

name: EIZO Rugged Solutions
description: EIZO Rugged Solutions designs rugged video graphics and GPGPU solutions featuring NVIDIA GPUs and embedded SoMs for military and aerospace applications. Products include 3U OpenVPX and XMC modules, plus compute & I/O-intensive single-board computers.

name: Emerald AI
description: Emerald AI solves the biggest bottleneck to the AI revolution—energy—by transforming AI data centers into flexible grid assets that can unlock hundreds of gigawatts of existing power capacity on today’s grids, drive lower power bills for communities, and make the grid more reliable.

name: Encord
description: Encord is the multimodal data platform for AI. With Encord, AI teams can easily manage, curate, and label petabytes of images, videos, audio, documents, text, and DICOM files on one unified platform while benefiting from AI-assisted speed and accuracy with human-in-the-loop workflows.

name: EverFocus
description: EverFocus is a global leader in Vision AI, focusing on robotics, smart manufacturing, and in-vehicle systems. We transform video data into actionable insights that improve safety and efficiency. Our solutions serve transportation, industrial automation, and smart environments across fleets, factories, and large facilities, helping clients create scalable, intelligent systems for real-time response and business value.

name: Exxact
description: Named 2024 & 2025 NVIDIA Partner Network Solution Integration Partner of the Year, Exxact delivers custom turnkey AI and HPC workstations, servers, clusters, and storage that empower clients to advance groundbreaking research and solve complex challenges across industries.

name: Flex
description: Flex is the manufacturing partner of choice that helps leading brands design, build, and manage products that improve the world. With a global footprint spanning 30 countries, Flex delivers advanced manufacturing solutions, innovative products, and lifecycle services that support customers from concept to scale. In the AI era, Flex helps customers accelerate data center deployment by solving power, heat, and scale challenges through power and cooling technology and IT infrastructure solutions.

name: Flexcompute
description: Flexcompute is a physics intelligence company that turns the laws of physics into a shared brain for engineers and agents to design, optimize, and operate real-world systems. With a platform that combines GPU-native multiphysics simulation, geometry-native reasoning, and neural memory that continuously learns from every simulation and test, Flexcompute dramatically reduces the latency to physics insight. Used across aerospace, automotive, energy, and advanced manufacturing.

name: Fogsphere
description: Fogsphere is an edge-first, real-time Safety, Security, and Operational Intelligence platform that turns cameras and sensors into live decision systems. On-prem or hybrid, it analyzes industrial sites at the edge to prevent incidents, enforce compliance, secure perimeters, and flag operational risk-automating responses to unsafe acts, vehicle-pedestrian conflicts, intrusions, and abnormal conditions. Integrates with HSE, security, and OT/IT for auditable mission-critical intelligence.

name: Fortanix
description: Fortanix is the global leader in data and AI security and a pioneer of Confidential Computing, delivering a unified platform to protect sensitive data, AI models, and applications across on-premises and multi-cloud environments—at rest, in transit, and in use. Built on hardware-enforced security, Fortanix enables workloads to run in tamper-proof, isolated enclaves, protecting against data leakage, model extraction, and unauthorized access, even from privileged insiders.

name: FPT
description: FPT is a global technology corporation operating in 30 countries and territories. We developed FPT AI Factory, a comprehensive ecosystem for end-to-end AI development. With robust AI infrastructure, intelligent platforms, and ready-to-use applications, FPT empowers enterprises, startups, and the tech community to accelerate their AI journey. Guided by the vision “Build Your Own AI,” we enable fast, efficient innovation while ensuring optimal price-performance and sovereign AI.

name: FriendliAI
description: FriendliAI is a leading AI inference platform company helping startups and enterprises deploy and scale AI models efficiently, cost-effectively, and reliably. Its platform delivers superior performance while reducing infrastructure costs, making it easy to move from AI experimentation to large-scale production. FriendliAI supports over 484,000 Hugging Face models through its Dedicated Endpoints, Serverless API, and Container solutions. Learn more at www.friendli.ai.

name: Future Tech

Future Tech helps organizations optimize their IT environments and transition to next-generation technologies. With deep expertise across aerospace, defense, healthcare, and manufacturing sectors, Future Tech understands how to navigate the complexities of enterprise-scale environments and the demands of multi-stakeholder organizations.

name: Gcore

Gcore manages its global IT infrastructure across six continents, with one of the best network performances in Europe, Africa, and LATAM. Gcore’s network consists of 210+ points of presence worldwide in reliable Tier IV and Tier III data centers, with a total network capacity exceeding 200 Tbps.

name: GE VERNOVA
description: GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE: GEV) is a purpose-built global energy company that includes Power, Wind, and Electrification segments and is supported by its accelerator businesses. Building on over 130 years of experience tackling the world’s challenges, GE Vernova is uniquely positioned to help lead the energy transition by continuing to electrify the world while simultaneously working to decarbonize it.

name: H2O.ai

name: Ignitarium

Our commercial portfolio includes quantum computers as well as quantum RF systems, quantum clocks, and inertial navigation solutions. Infleqtion is the partner of choice for governments and commercial customers seeking cutting-edge quantum capabilities.

Built for global scalability, multi-user collaboration, and enterprise deployment across cloud and on-premise environments.

name: Instrumental

Backed by a powerful data platform and synchronized models, Instrumental equips engineers to resolve issues permanently—delivering faster ramps, reliable products, and higher margins.

IQM provides both on-premises full-stack quantum computers and a cloud platform to access its computers. IQM customers include the leading high-performance computing centres, research labs, universities and enterprises which have full access to IQM's software and hardware.  IQM has over 300 employees with offices in Espoo, Madrid, Munich, Paris, Palo Alto, Singapore, Tokyo, Warsaw.  Read more: meetiqm.com

name: IQVIA
description: IQVIA is a leading global provider of clinical research services, commercial insights and healthcare intelligence to the life sciences and healthcare industries. IQVIA’s portfolio of solutions are powered by IQVIA Connected Intelligence™ to deliver actionable insights and services built on high-quality health data, Healthcare-grade AI®, advanced analytics, the latest technologies and extensive domain expertise.

name: Jacobs

See how at jacobs.com and connect with us on LinkedIn, Instagram, X and Facebook.

We're a global innovation partner enabling customers in communications, industrial automation, aerospace and defense, semiconductor, and general electronics markets to accelerate innovation to connect and secure the world.

KION’s supply chain solutions enable the smooth flow of materials and information in our customers’ warehouses, production plants, and distribution centers in over 100 countries worldwide.

Lattice Semiconductor is the low power programmable leader. Our technology, long-standing relationships, and commitment to world-class support let our customers quickly and easily unleash their innovation to create a smart, secure, and connected world.

For more information about Lattice, please visit www.latticesemi.com.

Development & manufacturing are Swiss-made. Dynamis is FDA cleared and in routinely use in a top tier U.S. hospital.

With a suite of developer tools and partnership with NVIDIA, it enables more accurate and intelligent video solutions for traffic management, public safety, and urban infrastructure.

MinIO is backed by Dell Technologies Capital, General Catalyst, Index Ventures, Intel Capital, SoftBank Vision Fund 2, and others.

We bring 15 years of experience building and running infrastructure at scale, a deep bench of AI infrastructure experts, and a composable full-stack AI infrastructure platform that streamlines operations, from Metal-to-Model™. Founded by Chris Lattner and Tim Davis, Modular delivers up to 70% lower costs and 4x performance gains for its customers.

name: Neousys Technology America, Inc.
description: Neousys designs and manufactures industrial computers and rugged GPU computing platform featuring exclusive mechanical and thermal designs to enable AI-powered for automation, robotics, autonomy and intelligent video analytics applications.

name: NEXCOM International Co., Ltd.
description: Founded in 1992, NEXCOM is a global leader in edge computing and industrial IoT solutions. It provides SD-Edge Computing, AIoT, cybersecurity, and more, driving innovation and sustainability to build an AIoT ecosystem for ESG transformation.

name: ODINN

With its integrated interface and proprietary thermal engineering, OMNIA delivers uncompromised data center-grade compute power within a portable, carry-on size chassis that can be deployed in minutes.

name: One Stop Systems

OSS offers ruggedized servers, compute accelerators, flash storage arrays, and storage acceleration software used in autonomous trucking and farming, aircraft, drones, ships, and vehicles.

name: Onyx Healthcare, Inc.

Certified to ISO 13485, IEC/UL 60601-1, ISO 14971, and FDA registered, with 7–10 year product longevity and award-winning innovation.

name: OpenEvidence, Inc.
description: OpenEvidence is the fastest-growing and most widely used clinical decision support platform in the United States, and the most widely used medical search engine among U.S. clinicians. Trusted by hundreds of thousands of verified healthcare professionals, it supports high-stakes, point-of-care decisions that are sourced, cited, and grounded in peer-reviewed medical literature. OpenEvidence is actively used daily by over 40% of U.S. physicians across more than 10,000 hospitals and medical centers.

name: Opentrons
description: We make robots for scientists. At Opentrons we believe that scientists should be able to focus on their science to accelerate discovery and innovation, and that access to automation is a key tool to facilitate that. Our mission is to democratize access to laboratory robotics. There are currently ten times the number of scientists to lab robots in the world. When we’re done, that ratio will be flipped, and there will be ten times the number of lab robots to scientists.

name: Pasqal
description: Pasqal is leading the industrialization of neutral-atom quantum computing, transforming Nobel Prize-winning research into real-world solutions for industry, science, and governments. Since 2019, the company has built high-performance quantum systems and cloud-ready software that tackle complex challenges in optimization, simulation, and AI. With a global footprint across Europe, North America, and Asia, and backed by over $215 million, Pasqal is accelerating quantum computing adoption.

name: PC Partner Technology Pte. Ltd.
description:
PC Partner Technology Pte. Ltd. has a wide range of portfolio includes branded video graphics cards, Mini PCs, motherboards, gaming hardware, and industrial-grade embedded and GPU-accelerated computing solutions. We also provide comprehensive electronic manufacturing services to reputable brands globally.
In 2025, PC Partner also joined the NVIDIA Partner Network (NPN) to address business and enterprise computing and visualization needs of today’s ever-changing market with GPU Server offerings.

name: Personal AI
description: The Small Language Model Platform Optimized For Edge Deployments.

name: Phaidra
description: Phaidra builds AI agents that autonomously optimize the complex power, cooling and workload management systems in AI factories to maximize tokens per watt.

From enterprise data centers and AI-powered ecosystems to mission-critical aerospace, automotive, and consumer devices, Phison continues to redefine what’s next in flash storage and memory.

PsiQuantum’s photonic approach enables it to leverage high-volume semiconductor manufacturing and existing cryogenic infrastructure to rapidly scale its systems. Learn more at www.psiquantum.com.

name: PTC
description: Our portfolio of software solutions manages data throughout a product’s lifecycle – driving excellence in engineering and design, efficiency in manufacturing and supply chain, and optimization in operations and service.

name: Qblox

The company provides the essential control and readout engine that empowers researchers and engineers to build high-performance, robust, and scalable systems. Trusted by academic and industrial leaders worldwide, Qblox sets the standard for quantum control and delivers the backbone for a new era of computing. Learn more at www.qblox.com.

name: Qodo
description: Qodo is a quality-first generative AI coding platform that helps developers write, test, and review code within IDE and Git. Our AI code generation offers automated code reviews, contextual suggestions, and comprehensive test generation.

name: Qt Group
description: Qt Group is a global software company offering cross-platform solutions for the entire software development lifecycle, from UI design and development to quality management. Following the industry-leading safety and security standards, Axivion is ideal for creating safety-critical software.

By tightly integrating quantum and classical operations, QM eliminates friction across hardware and software, enabling faster iteration, real-time adaptation, and scalable system design. Its platform supports any quantum processor, helping researchers and builders accelerate breakthroughs and push what’s possible.

name: Reflection
description: Frontier open intelligence accessible to all. Our team previously built frontier LLMs at labs like DeepMind, OpenAI, and Anthropic.

name: Rescale
